dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringment
dmca.body:
Les Kelly Enterprises

Huntington Beach, CA 92649-1765

E-mail: leskelly@

July 2, 2003
 
Don E. Green II
Amish Woodworking 				

Nappanee, IN 46550
				
Plymouth, IN 46563

Randy Burkholder
Pages-Online.com				

Plymouth, IN 46563

Re: 	Website Amish Woodworking
	Notice of Copyright Infringement
	Demand for Profit and Damages

Dear Don Green and Randy Burkholder:

I am writing to you on behalf of Mr. Doyle Yoder, President, DYP, Inc., Berlin, Ohio, regarding the use of three images at the website of Amish Woodworking. Mr. Yoder and I became aware recently of the illegal use of three of his images that appear prominently at http://amishwoodworking.com.

The purpose of my letter is to inform you your use of three of his images to create the connection between Amish Woodworking, the furniture that you sell, the Amish lifestyle and the reputation of the Amish for excellent craftsmanship is not a licensed use. You have illegally used three images (the company logo image that you use to advertise and promote your company, Amish Woodworking; the icon created from the Amish buggy framed against the sunset and the Amish harvest wagon used at the front page). Your illegal use of these images is a violation of US Copyright Law (17 USC
